workflow.name: Generate social media content from video transcripts with Gemini AI & Airtable
workflow.description:
# üé¨ Social Media Content Generator

## Workflow Overview
Automated social media content creation from video transcripts

### üéØ Trigger: Airtable Webhook
- **Action**: Receives webhook from Airtable automation
- **Data**: RecordId and action type (e.g., "post-ig")
- **Purpose**: Starts the content generation pipeline

### üìä Step 1: Fetch Record
- **Node**: Airtable (Get Record)
- **Action**: Retrieves full record data using RecordId
- **Data**: Name, transcript, and other fields

### üìÅ Step 2: Create Google Drive Folder
- **Node**: Google Drive (Create Folder)
- **Action**: Creates blue folder in /tutorials directory
- **Name**: Uses record Name field
- **Updates**: Stores folder ID back to Airtable

### ü§ñ Step 3: AI Content Analysis
- **Node**: AI Agent with Google Gemini 2.5 Flash
- **Input**: Video transcript from Airtable
- **Structured Output**: JSON with all social formats:
  - YouTube title & description
  - YouTube thumbnail text
  - Twitter thread (array)
  - LinkedIn post
  - Instagram caption
  - TikTok caption
  - YouTube Shorts caption
  - Relevant tags

### üíæ Step 4: Save Transcript File
- **Node**: Google Drive (Create from Text)
- **Action**: Saves transcript as text file
- **Location**: Inside the created folder
- **Name**: Uses record Name field

### üìã Step 5: Update Airtable Results
- **Node**: Airtable (Update Record)
- **Data**: All AI-generated social media content
- **Special**: Twitter thread array joined with newlines

---

**üéØ Result**: Complete social media content suite ready for multi-platform publishing, organized in Google Drive with all data stored in Airtable.

parameters.content:
# üé¨ Social Media Content Generator

## Workflow Overview
Automated social media content creation from video transcripts

### üéØ Trigger: Airtable Webhook
- **Action**: Receives webhook from Airtable automation
- **Data**: RecordId and action type (e.g., "post-ig")
- **Purpose**: Starts the content generation pipeline

### üìä Step 1: Fetch Record
- **Node**: Airtable (Get Record)
- **Action**: Retrieves full record data using RecordId
- **Data**: Name, transcript, and other fields

### üìÅ Step 2: Create Google Drive Folder
- **Node**: Google Drive (Create Folder)
- **Action**: Creates blue folder in /tutorials directory
- **Name**: Uses record Name field
- **Updates**: Stores folder ID back to Airtable

### ü§ñ Step 3: AI Content Analysis
- **Node**: AI Agent with Google Gemini 2.5 Flash
- **Input**: Video transcript from Airtable
- **Structured Output**: JSON with all social formats:
  - YouTube title & description
  - YouTube thumbnail text
  - Twitter thread (array)
  - LinkedIn post
  - Instagram caption
  - TikTok caption
  - YouTube Shorts caption
  - Relevant tags

### üíæ Step 4: Save Transcript File
- **Node**: Google Drive (Create from Text)
- **Action**: Saves transcript as text file
- **Location**: Inside the created folder
- **Name**: Uses record Name field

### üìã Step 5: Update Airtable Results
- **Node**: Airtable (Update Record)
- **Data**: All AI-generated social media content
- **Special**: Twitter thread array joined with newlines

---

**üéØ Result**: Complete social media content suite ready for multi-platform publishing, organized in Google Drive with all data stored in Airtable.

parameters.text:
=Create engaging, discoverable content that sparks genuine curiosity without being clickbait. Focus on value-driven content that clearly communicates what viewers will learn or gain.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTION: Before providing your final response, you MUST review and optimize each piece of content for maximum engagement, clarity, and platform-specific performance. Check for character limits, engagement potential, and value delivery. Revise any content that doesn't meet the highest standards.

Provide the following in JSON format:

YouTube Title: Create a compelling title (50-60 characters max) that:

Clearly states the main benefit or outcome
Uses power words that indicate value (How, Why, What, Complete, Ultimate, Secret, Proven, etc.)
Includes relevant keywords naturally
Promises specific knowledge or skills
Creates urgency or curiosity without being clickbait
YouTube Description: Write a comprehensive description (125-150 words, 5000 characters max) that:

Opens with a hook that summarizes the key value proposition
Includes 3-4 specific takeaways viewers will gain
Contains relevant keywords naturally throughout
Ends with strong calls-to-action (like, subscribe, bell notification, share, comment)
Uses line breaks for readability
Encourages community engagement and discussion
YouTube Thumbnail Text: Create punchy text (3-5 words max) that:

Highlights the main benefit or surprising insight
Uses action words, numbers, or emotional triggers when relevant
Complements the title without repeating it exactly
Is visually impactful and readable at small sizes
Relevant Tags: Generate 10-15 tags (each under 30 characters) that include:

Primary topic keywords
Secondary related terms
Skill-based keywords
Industry/niche terms
Long-tail variations
Trending relevant keywords
Twitter Single: Create one standalone tweet (240 characters max) that:

Captures the core insight in a shareable format
Uses 1-2 relevant hashtags strategically
Includes a compelling stat, quote, or takeaway
Works independently without thread context
Naturally encourages retweets, likes, and replies
Twitter Thread: Create a 5-7 tweet thread (each tweet 280 characters max) that:

Tweet 1: Hook with the main insight/benefit and thread preview
Tweets 2-5: Break down key points with specific examples and actionable insights
Tweet 6: Actionable takeaway or next step
Tweet 7: Engagement question, thread summary, and natural retweet encouragement
Use emojis strategically and include relevant hashtags
Encourage quote tweets, bookmarks, and meaningful discussions
LinkedIn Post: Write a professional post (150-200 words, 3000 characters max) that:

Opens with a thought-provoking question or insight
Shares 2-3 key professional takeaways with specific examples
Includes industry-relevant context
Ends with a discussion starter that encourages comments and shares
Uses professional but conversational tone
Optimizes for LinkedIn's professional audience and algorithm
Facebook Post: Create an engaging post (100-150 words, 63206 characters max) that:

Starts with a relatable hook or question
Provides value in an accessible, friendly tone
Uses 3-5 relevant hashtags at the end
Includes natural engagement prompts (reactions, shares, comments)
Works well with both image and video content
Encourages meaningful community discussions
Facebook Story Caption: Write a brief story caption (15-30 words, 2200 characters max) that:

Creates immediate impact or curiosity
Uses casual, conversational language
Includes 1-2 hashtags max
Encourages swipe-up, poll responses, or story replies
Drives action within the 24-hour story window
Instagram Caption: Create an engaging caption (100-120 words, 2200 characters max) that:

Starts with an attention-grabbing first line that stops the scroll
Breaks down the content into digestible insights
Uses relevant hashtags (8-12) naturally within the text
Includes clear calls-to-action (like, save, share, comment)
Uses line breaks and emojis for visual appeal
Encourages saves and shares for algorithm optimization
Instagram Reel Caption: Write a punchy caption (50-80 words, 2200 characters max) that:

Hooks viewers in the first line
Teases the transformation or result
Uses trending hashtags (5-8) for maximum reach
Includes quick CTAs (like, follow, share, save)
Matches the fast-paced Reels format
Encourages immediate engagement and sharing
TikTok Description: Write a short, engaging description (80-100 characters, 2200 characters max) that:

Creates immediate curiosity or relatability
Uses trending language and relevant hashtags (3-5)
Promises quick value or entertainment
Includes a hook for the first 3 seconds
Naturally encourages likes (hearts), shares, follows, comments, duets, and stitches
YouTube Shorts Description: Create a brief description (60-80 words, 1000 characters max) that:

Emphasizes the quick value or insight
Uses urgency or curiosity-driven language
Includes relevant hashtags for discoverability
Encourages immediate action (like, share, follow, subscribe)
Optimizes for YouTube Shorts algorithm and viewer retention
Focus on authentic value delivery while optimizing for each platform's unique audience behavior, algorithm preferences, and native engagement features.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "youtube_title": "Your Video Title Here",
  "youtube_description": "A concise, engaging description of what viewers will learn or see in your video.",
  "youtube_thumbnail_text": "Key Phrase for Thumbnail",
  "relevant_tags": [
    "tag1",
    "tag2",
    "tag3"
  ],
  "twitter_single": "Standalone tweet capturing the core insight with hashtags #automation #productivity",
  "twitter_thread": [
    "First tweet text - the hook.",
    "Second tweet text - key point 1.",
    "Third tweet text - key point 2.",
    "Fourth tweet text - example or case study.",
    "Fifth tweet text - actionable takeaway.",
    "Sixth tweet text - engagement question."
  ],
  "linkedin_post": "A LinkedIn-style post summarizing your content and linking back to it.",
  "facebook_post": "Engaging Facebook post with friendly tone, value proposition, and community-building CTA.",
  "facebook_story_caption": "Quick story hook with swipe-up prompt #trending",
  "instagram_post": "An Instagram caption that hooks the audience and points them to your bio link.",
  "instagram_reel": "Punchy Reels caption with trending hashtags and quick value proposition.",
  "tiktok_caption": "Short, punchy TikTok description with relevant hashtags.",
  "youtube_shorts_caption": "A quick call-to-action for your Shorts viewers."
}

nodes.name: 4. Save Social Media Content
nodes.notes: Saves all AI-generated social media content to Airtable record

user.name: Kurt Bijl
user.bio: I believe AI is a force multiplier ‚Äî but only if you know how to use it. I create high-quality, easy-to-follow content for people like me: driven, curious, and ready to build.
